summary: This is a small mod that makes changes to the Skaal Amulet.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/xbDPWdF.png[/img][/url][/center]

"It is said that, when the wearer is in dire need, this amulet will come to the wearer's aid, summoning powerful magicks, and possibly even keeping them out of Death's reach..."

Basically, I created this mod for myself, as I loved the look of the Skaal Amulet, but found that it was none enchantable, and thus I decided to do something about it. However, I didn't want to put any old enchantment on it, and thus I thought up the little backstory (above) to justify the choice of enchantment.

The necklace now has the same enchantment as the Dragon Priest mask Konahrik.

According to the Skyrim Wiki, these are the features of the mask, and thus the amulet.

[quote]On rare occasions, the mask [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Summon]summons[/url] a spectral Dragon Priest [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Follower_(Skyrim)]ally[/url]. The Dragon Priest may use [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Ice_Spike]Ice Spike[/url] and [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Reanimate_Corpse]Reanimate Corpse[/url]. In the event of no corpses nearby, the Dragon Priest will summon a [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Storm_Atronach_(Skyrim)]Storm Atronach[/url].

When the wearer is low on health, there is a chance that the mask will knock back enemies, heal the wearer and any nearby allies, and grant a fire cloak for a brief time. The healing benefit will raise the restoration skill, and the fire cloak will aid the destruction skill. A similar healing effect can be achieved with the perk [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Restoration_(Skyrim)#Perks]Avoid Death[/url], which activates when health reaches a critical low with no random variables. However, the perk is limited to one activation per day, whereas the mask's effect is constant.
